briefTitle: Collection of Blood From Patients With Cancer, Other Tumors, or Tumor Predisposition Syndromes for Genetic Analysis
officialTitle: Collection of Blood From Patients With Cancer, Other Tumors, or Tumor Predisposition Syndromes for Analysis of Genetic Differences in Drug Disposition
conditions: Prostate Cancer, Breast Cancer, Lung Cancer, Ovarian Cancer, Lymphoma
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Obtain and analyze the genomic DNA from patients with cancer, other tumors, or possible genetic tumor predisposition syndromes on a therapeutic clinical trial.
eligibilityCriteria:
* INCLUSION CRITERIA:

Patients with cancer, other tumors, or tumor predisposition syndromes currently enrolled in NIH intramural research program therapeutic trials.

Ability of participant or Legally Authorized Representative (LAR) to understand and be willing to sign the informed consent document.

Age \>= 3 years old

EXCLUSION CRITERIA:

N/A
